title: Historical Christmas Foods from 100 Years Ago
description: Learn what our ancestors served at Christmas and the history and necessity behind the recipes. Old-fashioned tips and recipes, plus tips to serve up some of these foods for your family in homesteading and pioneer style. Both the stories and their self-sufficiency were the base for many of these traditional Christmas foods.
content:encoded: Learn what our ancestors served at Christmas and the history and necessity behind the recipes. Old-fashioned tips and recipes, plus tips to serve up some of these foods for your family in homesteading and pioneer style. Both the stories and their self-sufficiency were the base for many of these traditional Christmas foods.
itunes:subtitle: Old-fashioned Recipes from the Pioneers
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
